column3: I don't know if this is the right place to publish plugins if it is not where do i publish a plugin
Anyway i have created a plugin that allows a developer to quickly resize image files within their projects (more features to come)
Hope this will be of use to someone and have a great day!

Please publish the plugin to JetBrains Plugin Repository. Check this link for details: https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/help/preparing-plugins-for-publishing.html
Thank you for your contribution!
Thanks a lot Have a great day
